result.execSummary:
The defendant Troy A Koestler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • OWI (5th or 6th), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Any vehicle titled or registeredin the defendant's name is subject to IID as is defendant himself, and device to be installed within 14 days of today's date.

miscConds.notes: $50.00 installation fee to be paid immediately.

Defendant allowed to work in the kitchen of any tavern.
DNA sample w/ surcharge.

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.  

A copy of the police report has been faxed to the probation office.

timeConds.notes: SERVE 6 MONTHS with 45 days to report and w/ huber for work, school, and treatment only if defendant is in compliance with drivers safety plan and all terms and conditions of IID.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Troy A Koestler

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Case called: 11:32 am
Includes 15CF129 and 15TR750.
Clerk: Kassidi
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher:
Defendant appears in person and with Atty Dan Cveykus;
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves Deemed Refusal Lawful 15TR750 case -COURT GRANTS.  

PLEA: Ct. 1 (OWI 5th)>>NO CONTEST.
Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: Sentence W/H - 3 years probation. CONDITIONS: Impose 1 year MCJ and serve 6 months with 45 days to report and w/huber for work/school/treatment only if defendant is in compliance with drivers safety plan and all terms and conditions of IID. Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 36 months, as is the defendant himself, and device to be installed within 14 days of today's date; $50 IID installation fee to be paid immediately; 36 months dl revocation; AODA unless already completed. Absolute Sobriety. $2452 fine inclusive of Court Costs, $165 AODA fee. COURT finds 3 days credit for time served. Defendant allowed to work in the kitchen of any tavern, must obtain absolute sobriety. DNA Sample and Surcharge. 

Adjourned: 11:43 am
Assessment bill ($165.00) North Central Health Care
Plea hearing on April 7, 2015 at 11:30 am.
